title: Email Assistant
description: AI-powered email assistant with Spring Boot backend, React frontend, Chrome extension for efficient, context-aware email drafting using modern web technologies

title: Project B
description: This is a project made to learn the latest languages by building an app.A Spring Boot service exposing a clean REST API to generate email drafts on demand

title: Project C
description: This is a project made to learn a building app. A responsive single-page app (Vite + React) that collects recipient details, desired tone, subject, and key points,
